thread.title: Brandon M.
thread.title_full: Bundle Stars reviewed by Brandon M.

author: Brandon M.
title: Brandon M.
text:
I buy from Bundle Stars when it has the lowest price on the game(s) I'm looking for via isthereanydeal.com.
I've made a few purchases now and feel comfortable enough to buy keys without any reservations.
The process is simple and easy - no hoops to jump through, and no worries getting about grey-market keys.
